intro.title: How to suture right with Kelly Grasper
intro.descriptionText: Surgical suture is a medical device used to hold body tissues together after an injury or surgery. Application generally involves using a needle with an attached length of thread. A number of different shapes, sizes, and thread materials have been developed over its millennia of history.

video.title: How to suture right with Kelly Grasper
video.name: by Doctor Hansensbacher Zurich, Sept 2019

selfassesmentquestions.question: My knot was tied tightly and in the correct location

evaluation.title: Evaluation
evaluation.feedbacktext: Not bad. Next time try doing this and this to improve your technique. Next time try performing 2 left loops and 1 right loop.
evaluation.ratingtext: How was the case? Rate yourself

end.cancelMessage: We would be pleased to welcome you back
